page.title: 16DALBEATTIE IN THE NEWS
page.content: Our local newspaper is{"The Galloway {News."}On Thursday,13th June 1985, there were quite a few articles on Dalbeattie in it. David James,a very good amateur golfer, reached the semi-finals of the {British Amateur Golf Championship}and was awarded a bronze medal. Bill Simpson finished in second place and set the fastest lap speed of 106 mph in the{Isle of Man Production T.T. Murray Grierson came in 9th position in the{Lloyds Bowmaker Scottish Rally and Stewart Robertson finished 26th. Cameron Hitchell, a former Scottish Junior International footballer, returned to this area as player/coach of a local team. In a letter to the editor a ratepayer complained that heating systems in some council houses were being replaced without any consultation.
